title: Spy Salad: Mission in Veggie Valley
tagline: They're fresh, they're green, and they're on a covert bean!
mpaa_rating_content: This film is rated G for general audiences. It contains no material that parents would find inappropriate for children.
critic_review: While 'Spy Salad: Mission in Veggie Valley' may not break new ground in the genre, its wholesome humor and vibrant performances by Alba-cado and Clooneybean are sure to entertain families. Cucumberbrick's direction adds a quirky charm that leaves you rooting for these leafy heroes. A delightful dish best served fun!
description: In the heart of Veggie Valley, two unlikely heroes, Avocadia (Jessica Alba-cado) and Broc (George Clooneybean), team up for the crunchiest mission of their lives. Avocadia, a world-renowned graffiti artist with a heart of gold, and Broc, a sharp-eyed photographer seeking redemption, find themselves entangled in a high-fiber spy game. Directed by the legendary Stanley Cucumberbrick, this pair must peel back the layers of a mysterious plot that threatens the peace of their salad bowl society. Will Avocadia and Broc lettuce save the day, or will they simply wilt under pressure? Dive into 'Spy Salad: Mission in Veggie Valley' for a family-friendly adventure that promises to be a-peeling to audiences of all ages!
prompt: Create a simple and silly title, short and simple tounge-in-cheek tagline, and description teaser of a MPAA G rated movie. Starring Jessica Alba-cado and George Clooneybean as the main characters. Directed by Stanley Cucumberbrick. A Streaming Exclusive Spy Film including a Graffiti Artist and a Photographer participating in a Redemption. make the character names of Viking origin. Provide the reason for the rating. Provide a critic score between 1 and 10 as critic_score. Provide a critic review as critic_review. Output result as json, title as the title property, tagline as the tagline property, rating as mpaa_rating, rating reason as rating_content, assign it a single word genre as genre, description as the description property.
image_prompt: Illustrate a whimsical, vibrant valley filled with anthropomorphic vegetables engaged in spy activities. Picture Avocadia, a sly avocado with a spray paint can, next to Broc, a keen-eyed broccoli with a camera, both in a stealthy pose. They are surrounded by a lush environment of garden greenery, hinting at hidden secrets. The scene should be playful and colorful, reflecting a family-friendly adventure in "Spy Salad: Mission in Veggie Valley".
